title: Ustyme and Reading Is Fundamental Partner on Digital Learning Initiatives
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/13/2015 @ 9:32 AM Companies mentioned in this article: ustyme 
SAN FRANCISCO -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Ustyme and Reading Is Fundamental (RIF), the nation’s largest children’s literacy nonprofit, announce a partnership to get free e-books into the hands of children who need them most. RIF will leverage the Ustyme digital platform as an exciting new literary resource that further extends its reach to families and volunteers. 
“We are delighted to partner with Ustyme to get free e-books and reading activities to children,” noted Carol H. Rasco, president and CEO of RIF. “Choice of a wide array of titles motivates children to read more, leading to increased success in reading. We look forward to making these e-books available to our RIF programs and others.” 
“We passionately believe that every digital device touched by a child should have books to read, and encourage experiences that transform screen-time into "us time,” noted Joe Salesky, CEO of Ustyme. “It's exciting to partner with RIF to promote essential reading time with children and families." 
Ustyme’s digital platform transforms smart phones, tablets and computers that families already have at home, into a library of vibrant digital storybooks that children can share with caring adults either side-by-side or remotely. With hundreds of titles available, sharing stories and promoting literacy is a click away. 
About RIF 
Reading Is Fundamental delivers free books and literacy resources to children and families in economically disadvantaged communities in the United States. By giving children the opportunity to own a book, RIF inspires them to become lifelong readers and achieve their full potential. RIF is leading the way to help minimize the summer learning slide through Read for Success , a ground-breaking program intervention for early elementary students to reduce summer learning loss and improve reading proficiency all year long. As the nation’s largest children’s literacy nonprofit, RIF has placed more than 412 million books in the hands of 40 million children since it was established in 1966. To learn more and help provide free books to kids who need them most, visit www.rif.org . 
About Ustyme 
Ustyme is the first digital platform that enables people to share activities—reading books, playing games and much more—while spending time together side-by-side or in a real-time video experience. Available for iPhone , iPad , Chromebook and web , the Ustyme App makes it easy to socialize in a video call and create meaningful, deeper relationships through shared experiences of any type of content, in any language, on virtually any device. The company was founded by a team of family-first entrepreneurs with vast experiences in digital technology and entertainment. Ustyme is based in Sausalito, California. For more information please visit www.ustyme.com and blog.ustyme.com .
